name: 主人公（Ｐ４）
ability: 【A】 ［①］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to 1 《メガネ》 Character and up to 1 Character with 「＆」 in its name and show them to your opponent, add them to Hand. Shuffle your Deck afterwards.
【A】 When this card attacks, you may declare 1 trait. If you did, until the next declaration of this ability, this card gains that trait.
【A】 When this card attacks, if 「イザナギ覚醒」 is in the Climax Slot, all your 《魔法》 Characters, during that turn, get +2000 Power and +1 Soul.

name: 陽介＆ジライヤ
flavor_text:
お前は、俺で･･･俺は、お前か。
全部ひっくるめて、俺って事だな
ability: 【C】 Upon playing this card from Hand, choose 1 of your 「花村 陽介」, you may place it into Waiting Room. If you did, this card can be played with Cost 0.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during that turn, this card gets +1 Soul.

name: 堂島 遼太郎
flavor_text:
これからしばらくは家族同士だ。
自分んちと思って気楽にやってくれ
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose 1 of your 《勇者》 Character or Character with 「主人公」 in its name, during that turn, it gets +3000 Power and +1 Soul.
【A】 At the end of your turn, if you have a Character in Memory, return this card to Hand.

name: 花村 陽介
ability: 【C】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

name: 堂島 菜々子
flavor_text:
とちゅうまで、おんなじ道だから
･･･いっしょに行こ
ability: 【A】 BOND／「主人公（Ｐ４）」 ［①］ （When this card is played onto Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「主人公（Ｐ４）」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand）
【A】［① REST this card］ Choose 1 of your 《勇者》 Character or Character with 「主人公」 in its name, during that turn, it gets +1 Soul.

ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +2 Soul.

name: 千枝＆トモエ
ability: 【C】 Upon playing this card from Hand, choose 1 of your 「里中 千枝」, you may place it into Waiting Room. If you did, this card can be played with Cost 0.
【A】［②］ During your turn, when your opponent's STAND Character becomes REST, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 of your opponent's STAND Character, place it into Memory.

name: 久慈川 りせ
flavor_text:
お豆腐は、みんなにおまけ。
なんか、心配してもらったみたいだし

flavor_text:

りせちー、超うれしー！
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed into Climax slot from Hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 of your Characters, during that turn, it gets +3 Soul.

ability: 【C】 Upon playing this card from Hand, choose 1 of your 「天城 雪子」, you may place it into Waiting Room. If you did, this card can be played with Cost 0.

【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST)

ability: 【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if the Character battling this card is Level 0 or lower, you may REVERSE that Character.
